content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Greetings Juan, thank you for your interest in my property. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Can you please provide me with your budget and any other relevant information that will help us come to an agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 800 Euros per month. I am a student so I don't need a lot of space. I am dependable and responsible. Can you offer me a price that fits my budget?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Juan. Based on the information you provided, I can offer you the apartment for a monthly rental price of 900 Euros. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the expenses that come with renting it. I believe this price is fair and reasonable, and I think it would be a good fit for you as a student. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euros. I would like to negotiate on the terms of the lease.
Can you please provide me with a draft lease agreement that I can review and sign?
Also, can you tell me if there are any additional costs that I need to be aware of, such as utilities or maintenance fees?
Thank you.

Mister Heine
Juan Mamani
Bolivia
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Of course, Juan. I have prepared a draft lease agreement for you to review. Please find it attached to this message. The lease agreement outlines the terms and conditions of the rental, including the monthly rental price, security deposit, and any additional fees or charges that may apply.

In terms of additional costs, you will be responsible for paying for your own utilities, such as electricity, gas, and water. I will provide you with information on the average utility costs in the area, so you can budget accordingly. Additionally, you will be responsible for any maintenance or repairs that are needed in the apartment, unless they are caused by damage or neglect on my part.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement or the additional costs. I am happy to answer any questions you may have and negotiate any terms that may be necessary to reach an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
